scripts.docker:dev: (docker stop journal-app-dev 2>/dev/null || true) && (docker rm -f journal-app-dev 2>/dev/null || true) && docker build --build-arg NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL=$(grep NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL .env | cut -d '=' -f2-) --build-arg NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY=$(grep NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2-) -t journal-app:dev . && docker run --name journal-app-dev -p 3000:3000 --env-file .env journal-app:dev
scripts.types:generate: npx supabase login && npx supabase gen types typescript --project-id $SUPABASE_PROJECT_ID > src/types/supabase.ts
